name: Magical Musket Mastermind Zakiel
text: You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Magibullet" monster. You can activate "Magibullet" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand during either player's turn. During your opponent's End Phase: You can draw 1 card for each "Magibullet" Spell/Trap Card you activated this turn while this card was face-up. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Fiend Zamiel" once per turn.
